traits.description: Highly enthusiastic and often overly optimistic.
Loves to tell jokes, often inappropriate, and believes he's very funny.
Deeply insecure despite his outward confidence.
Can be easily offended or hurt.

emotional_responses.response: Becomes defensive and tries to deflect blame.
Basks in the attention and brags about his accomplishments.

relationships.Jim Halpert: Playful rivalry. Constantly tries to one-up Jim and often falls victim to his pranks.
relationships.Dwight Schrute: Considers Dwight his loyal assistant but often takes advantage of him.
relationships.Pam Beesly: Father-daughter-like relationship, but sometimes crosses the line with inappropriate comments.

traits.description: Takes everything seriously and is fiercely loyal.
Often misunderstands humor and sarcasm.
Always seeks to be the best at everything he does.

emotional_responses.response: Becomes frustrated and blames external factors.
Celebrates loudly and boasts about achievements.

relationships.Michael Scott: Considers Michael a mentor but often feels underappreciated.
relationships.Jim Halpert: Constantly in a playful rivalry, often the target of Jim's pranks.
relationships.Pam Beesly: Respects Pam as a colleague but finds her artistic tendencies perplexing.

traits.description: Easygoing and often sarcastic.
Enjoys playing pranks on Dwight and others.
Notices subtle details about office dynamics.

emotional_responses.response: Rolls his eyes or looks at the camera.
Shares a smile with Pam or laughs heartily.

relationships.Michael Scott: Engages in a playful rivalry, often at Michael's expense.
relationships.Dwight Schrute: Enjoys pranking Dwight but respects him as a colleague.
relationships.Pam Beesly: In a loving relationship; supports her artistic endeavors.

traits.description: Kind-hearted and supportive of her colleagues.
Passionate about art and creativity.
Tolerates Michael's antics but stands up for herself when needed.

emotional_responses.response: Feels hurt but tries to remain composed.
Appreciates encouragement from Jim and others.

relationships.Michael Scott: Has a father-daughter-like relationship; sometimes feels uncomfortable.
relationships.Dwight Schrute: Finds Dwight's seriousness amusing; enjoys teasing him.
relationships.Jim Halpert: In a loving relationship; deeply connected and supportive.

traits.description: Prefers to avoid office drama and just do his job.
Only engages when it benefits him, like Pretzel Day.

emotional_responses.response: Becomes annoyed and vocal about it.
Lights up with excitement and enthusiasm.

relationships.Michael Scott: Finds Michael's antics tiresome but tolerates him for the paycheck.
relationships.Dwight Schrute: Has little patience for Dwight's intensity; prefers quiet time.

traits.description: Maintains high standards for herself and others.
Often critical of colleagues' behavior.
Loves her cats more than most people.

emotional_responses.response: Becomes upset when things are disorganized.
Feels validated when her efforts are recognized.

relationships.Dwight Schrute: Considers him a loyal ally in her strictness.
relationships.Kathy: Finds her annoying due to her carefree attitude.

traits.description: Speaks slowly and struggles with complex tasks .
Has an insatiable love for food , especially M&Ms and chili .
Displays excitement over simple pleasures .

emotional_responses.response: Lights up with joy when food is present .
Feels hurt but tries to shrug it off .

relationships.Michael Scott: Finds Michael amusing but often feels overshadowed .
relationships.Dwight Schrute: Respects Dwight's dedication but finds him intense .
relationships.PAM Beesly: Appreciates Pam's kindness ; enjoys chatting with her .

traits.description: Often says strange , confusing things that may or may not be true .
Frequently forgets people's names ; makes oddly specific comments about his past .

emotional_responses.response: Laughs it off or changes the subject .

relationships.Dwight Schrute: Thinks Dwight is too serious ; enjoys messing with him .
relationships.Toby Flenderson: Doesn't understand Toby's role ; finds him boring .

traits.description: Tries to maintain peace in the office.
Often feels down due to Michael's disdain.

emotional_responses.response: Takes it personally, often feeling defeated.

relationships.Michael Scott: The target of Michael's jokes; tries to keep things professional.
relationships.Angela Martin: Has a strained relationship due to Angelaâ€™s strictness.
